remarks: The law of concretion for a binary relation.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1999.)
statement:
opelopab.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
opelopab.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
opelopab.3 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
opelopab.4 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
brab.5 $e |- R = { <. x , y >. | ph } $.
brab $p |- ( A R B <-> ch ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d ch x y $.
